errorMessages.password-min-length: Password should atleast contain 7 characters, 1 uppercase character and 1 letter
errorMessages.first-name-min-length: First name should atleast contain 2 characters
errorMessages.first-name-max-length: First name should should not contain more than 15 characters
errorMessages.last-name-min-length: Last name should atleast contain 2 characters
errorMessages.last-name-max-length: Last name should should not contain more than 30 characters
passwordInputComponent.help-text: The password should atleast contain 7 characters and contain 1 uppercased letter and 1 number.
onboardingCompletedComponent.title: You have been registered!
onboardingCompletedComponent.description: You now have access to the dashboard where you can create collectgroups and add more users.
notFoundComponent.title: Something went wrong
notFoundComponent.description: This page was not found, check the input or contact our helpdesk if you require assistance
onboardingCheckInboxComponent.title: Please check your inbox
onboardingCheckInboxComponent.descriptio: We've sent you a new email that contains a link to signup with the e-mail you've provided. If you did not receive the e-mail please check your SPAM inbox.
onboardingWelcomeComponent.title: Welcome to the personal dashboard of {{name}}. Register with Givt to gain access to the dashboard of Givt where you can see the collections for {{name}}.
onboardingWelcomeComponent.differentEmai: Click here to use a different e-mail address
onboardingWelcomeComponent.goToDashboard: Click here to go to the dashboard
onboardingPersonalDetailsComponent.title: What is your first and lastname?
errorMessages.iban-min-length: The IBAN should atleast contain 12 characters
errorMessages.iban-max-length: The IBAN should not contain more then 34 characters
errorMessages.sortcode-length: The sort code should be 6 characters in length
errorMessages.accountnumber-length: The account nummer should be 8 characters in length
onboardingBankAccountIntroComponent.desc: Add a bankaccount to your Givt-account where you want to receive your gifts
onboardingBankAccountAddComponent.title: Add bankaccount
onboardingBankAccountAuthorizedComponent: Are you authorized to verify the bank-account of {0}?
We send a SMS-code to this number so we can verify your bank-account.
We gonna ask the person by mail to verify the bank account.
Zodra de bankrekening is geverifieerd, voegen we deze toe aan uw dashboard en kunt u daar de giften ontvangen.

loginComponent.title: Welcome to the Givt Dashboard. Log in to get access.
errorMessages.lockedOut: There have been too many attempts at logging in. Due to security reasons your account has been temporarily blocked. Please try again later.
errorMessages.wrongEmailOrPassword: Wrong e-mail address or password, please try again.
errorMessages.accountDisabled: Your account has been disabled. Please contact our support service for more information.
errorMessages.oneAttemptLeft: You have only 1 attempt left to log in.
errorMessages.twoAttemptLeft: You have only 2 attempts left to log in.
